title: Practical Video Production for Education Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental instructional design theories and digital content creation
context.additional_context: Training applying the ADDIE model for creating language education videos in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Develop a plan for producing educational videos by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Design effective video content that combines text, images, and audio based on multimedia learning theory.
Execute the process of filming, editing, and sharing videos in a limited technological environment (smartphone-based).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
